comprehensive_overview: Numba is an open-source just-in-time (JIT) compiler that translates a subset of Python and NumPy code into fast machine code.
core_features: 1. Just-in-time (JIT) compilation for improving the performance of Python and NumPy code. 2. Support for parallel computing with multi-threading. 3. Seamless integration with NumPy arrays and functions. 4. Easy to use and efficient optimization techniques like loop unrolling and vectorization.
